component.name: WiVRn server
component.summary: Play your PC VR games on a standalone headset

description.p: WiVRn allows you to run your VR games from your PC and play them from a standalone headset.
Works with the WiVRn client app on standalone headsets, available as an APK and on the Meta Store.

ul.li: Supports OpenXR and OpenVR applications through xrizer or OpenComposite
Controller tracking, hand tracking, eye gaze tracking, body tracking as supported by the headset
Audio streaming and microphone
Low latency video streaming with H264 / HEVC / AV1 compression
Hardware accelerated compression with Vulkan video encode, VAAPI or NVENC
Software compression with x264
Meta Quest 1, 2, 3, 3S, pro
Pico Neo 4
HTC Vive Focus 3, XR Elite

description.p: For desktop streaming, check out wlx-overlay-s.
